body:
jerichopumpkin @ forum asks
let the player choose an exiled card (obviously also from a list of cards exiled with a specific card) as a target for an effect. This would open the road for a bunch of cards.
author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)
title: able to choose card exiled with permanent as target
content:
_From [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/) on December 06, 2013 10:30:39_

jerichopumpkin @ forum asks
let the player choose an exiled card (obviously also from a list of cards exiled with a specific card) as a target for an effect. This would open the road for a bunch of cards.

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=437_
